resources.string: Số lượng bệnh nhân không đồng nhất do có 1 vài ca bệnh có trình trạng khác so với các trường hợp còn lại, xem thêm tại https://ncov.moh.gov.vn/

resources.string: Ca nhiễm theo Quốc gia/ Vùng lãnh thổ

It usually takes 2–14 days to the symptoms appear on the infected patient. In some specific cases, symptoms appear after 28 days since the patient is infected. According to WHO, the common COVID-19 symptoms are:

string.name: list
string.ul:
Fever or chills\n
Cough\n
Fatigue\n
Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing\n
Muscle or body aches\n
New loss of taste or smell\n
Sore throat\n
Congestion or runny nose\n
Nausea or vomiting\n
Headache\n
Diarrhea

string.name: hospital
string.a: List of hospital in Vietnam where can test for COVID-19

resources.string: IMT COVID-19 is an Android application that was developed based on the website about COVID-19 which you can find here. We are Nguyen Tri Huan and Nguyen Duc Dan, under the supervision of Dr. Sebastian Basterrech from FEI, VSB-TUO, Ostrava, Czech Republic and this is the final project to the thesis defence of University of Science and Technology of Hanoi(USTH).
